name: chuffing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to emphasize what is being said, or to express anger: It's chuffing cold out there! Do what you want; it's your chuffing house! They've closed the road and you've got to go all the chuffing way round.
More examplesFewer examplesChuffing hell, that's big!It's better than sitting watching telly all chuffing day long.I'm chuffing annoyed about it.I couldn't hear a chuffing word they were saying.
